title: Monster Truck Stunts
description: Monster truck stunts? No problem. Choose your truck, race, collect all the coins and prove your driving skills. The green light is on! Go!
instructions: Controls: • WS - accelerate/break • AD - rotate pitch

title: Highway Robbers
description: Highway Robbers is about racing traffic, avoiding cars, obstacles and the police, collecting cars and most importantly having fun. Collect coins, to get new cars and complete collections! Drive at full speed to score big and be the #1.
instructions: Arrows keys or Touch for Play

title: Wall fixing
description: Wall fixing is all about move the block to get fixed in empty space.
instructions: Use Arrow Keys to move the block

title: Virus War Multiplayer
description: An addicting online/multiplayer game. Move your virus cleverly and shoot out the others. Select your virus and start fighting now! Have fun! How to play: - Mouse on desktop. - Virtual control on mobile.
instructions: Virtual control on mobile. Mouse on desktop.

title: Lucky Looter
description: Lucky Looter is a cool 3D stealth game. This kind of game is a little bit difficult. You need to be careful to avoid those "sight range" to be able to enter safely. Be patient when you are going in or out. With the development of the level, the difficulty will be greater and greater. Wish you can steal more treasures in the game Lucky Looter!
instructions: Slide on the screen to play

title: Perfect Pipes
description: In this game full of satisfying graphics and innovative levels, you can challenge yourself, your brain, and your friends! It’s you against physics and the tricky levels — WHO WILL WIN? All balls have to go into the pipe … can you connect the right pipes in the right order and make it happen?
instructions: Drag the soft pipes to connect them!

title: Right Shot
description: Right Shot is a very fun casual game that will test your skills and reasoning. With a “Drag and Drop” system you can pull the elastic to make the ball bounce and knock down the targets. Try to finish each level with as few balls as possible to get more points. You can pop boxes of TNT explosives to break more than one target at the same time and save balls. The designs are beautiful and colorful.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Penguin Avoids
description: Our hero is ready to show you this in the game Penguin Avoids. He is just about to collect gold stars, which have gone down much lower than usual, there are opportunities to get them, and we ate a good job. Click on the penguin and he will bounce. Skip all dangerous objects to achieve the goal. Pay attention to the sharp edges of the field to the left and to the right, it is undesirable to touch them.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Monster Truck Impossible Stunt Track
description: Each of the deadliest stunt races prove your worth as a professional monster truck stunt driver strength and make it sure that you will find it most difficult yet most addictive and interesting.
instructions: High quality thrilling background music gives it a real life effect. 3D animation of the trucks and edgy tracks brings out more life into mega truck stunt race. High air jumps and high tracks makes the game deadliest.

title: Fruit Slicing
description: An addicted typical arcade game, simple to play, nice design, fun and relax-able. Slice all the fruits before the time runs out. Some fruits are harder to be sliced (need to slice twice or more to destroy them). Avoid the bomb or your score will be deducted. Collect the special items for more advantages (eg. clock items will slow down the time (or the movement speed), banana items will add bonus scores). Prove that you are a skilled fruit ninja. PLAY NOW!

title: High Jump
description: Our hero will go to a special site and there will stand on the platform. From different sides will appear a different kind of plate, which will move at different speeds. You will have to wait until the platform comes up to our hero and click on the screen. The hero will jump and jump on the block. For this you will get points. If you do not have time to do this, then your hero will hit the block and it will fall off the platform.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Knife Hit Up
description: An addicted arcade game, simple to control, nice design, fun and relax-able. Prove that you are a skilled knife-throwing master. PLAY NOW!
instructions: Tap or Click to throw knives

title: Stack Ball 2
description: Stack Ball is a 3d arcade game where players smash, bump and bounce through revolving helix platforms to reach the end. Sound easy? You wish!! Your ball smashes like a brick through colorful platforms that block its descent, but if you hit a black one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again. But even black platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed!
instructions: Tap or Hold Mouse to play!

title: Scatty Maps Mexico
description: Do you know geography of Mexico? It's time to play and learn about this country. Place all Mexican states on right places in the shortest time possible. You'll be able to see their flags, capitals and population and extend your knowledge.
instructions: Drag and drop maps of states on the place where they should be.

title: Mortar Watermelon
description: Mortar Watermelon is interesting logical puzzle game with 36 levels. You need to collect more fruits on your way and to avoid blades and other obstacles while you move to the goal. use mouse to aim and move the basket with watermelon. Start to play and enjoy in this game.
instructions: Use mouse to aim and play
